item.title: Jumping Network Segregation with RDP
item.description:
Introduction

This short post demonstrates how it may be possible to pivot into a segregated/protected network, via an RDP Jump Box.

item.title: A Citrix Story
item.description: I recently had the pleasure of partaking in a Citrix Virtual Desktop infrastructure assessment.
